sentences.sContent: The general principle of law should be involved in purposiveness, relevance and acceptability.
sentences.sContent_eng: The general principle of law should be involved in purposiveness, relevance and acceptability.
sentences.sCn: 该原则为行政法上一般法律原则，必须具备合目的性、关联性、可接受性三大要素。

sentences.sContent: Judgment can play the role because of its priori principle——the principle of natural purposiveness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Judgment can play the role because of its priori principle——the principle of natural purposiveness.
sentences.sCn: 判断力之所以能够作为联结彼此的中介，关键在于它的一个先验原则——自然的合目的性原则。
